resources.string: Nano Timer Pro features have been unlocked!
This app is used as an unlocker to have access to Pro features within Nano Timer.\nKeep both Pro and Free apps installed to avoid losing your times.
Open Nano Timer to start using the new features.
Nano Timer is not installed.\nPlease install the free version (in addition to this one) to start using the Pro features.
Your Nano Timer free version is too old. Please upgrade it to the latest version to be able to access the new unlocked features.
Could not find the market app
Could not launch Nano Timer app
